alert.note: Alert for Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 3:30PM CST until January 22 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches is expected through Saturday evening. Winds will remain light, around 5 to 10 MPH. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue through this evening, tapering off from northwest to southeast. Expect visibility reductions to under one mile in areas of moderate to heavy snowfall.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
